name: Island Gods
description:
Island Gods

A basic 4X-ish strategy game built in the pico8 fantasy console. Play as a god, guiding your followers to glory. Conquer the randomly generated archipelago, or mine it for resources to win an economic victory.

Controls

If you can't seem to control the game, try clicking on it to enable keyboard controls!

Z : select region/move followers

X : end turn

left/right/up/down : move cursor

Developer's Notes

This was a mini-project built in pico8 in just over a week. Bugs and programmer art may both be present in no small measure.

I managed to dig up the p8 cartridge. If you've enjoyed this game and want to download it you can!
